<!--sustained performance--> <!-- B CPU - Cluster min freq ~1.05GHz --> <!-- L CPU - Cluster min freq ~1.03GHz --> <!-- B CPU - Cluster max freq ~1.80GHz --> <!-- GPU - min pwrlevel 2 --> <!-- GPU - max pwrlevel 0 --> <!-- Max Prime CPUs 0 --> <Config Id="0x00001206" Enable="true" Target="msmnile" Timeout="0" Resources="0x40800000, 0x420, 0x40800100, 0x40C, 0x40804000, 0x70C, 0X42804000, 0x2, 0X42808000, 0x0, 0x41004200, 0x0"/> <!--vr mode--> <Config Id="0x00001207" Enable="true" Target="msmnile" Timeout="0" Resources=""/>
<!--vr mode sustained performance--> <Config Id="0x00001301" Enable="true" Target="msmnile" Timeout="0" Resources=""/>
<!-- same settings for all the VR power levels intentionally -->
